item.title: How to Become CEO - The Rules for Rising to the Top of Any Organization by Jeffrey J. Fox
item.description: This is a great book. You can open any page and random and find tidbits that immediately resonate with you.

item.title: Blink - The Power of Thinking Without Thinking by Malcom Gladwell
item.description: I like the writing style of Malcom Gladwell. With enchanting short real-life stories and fascinating anecdotes, he takes you right into the book, to a different world where you are a student who is observing and studying the behavior of the people in different parts of the world, effortlessly moving to and fro through different periods of time.

item.title: The Spinning Melody and the Gateway
item.description: Reading “The Proof of Heaven” by Dr. Eben Alexander is almost like experiencing the NDE that he went through, to really be at the hospital with him where his loved ones were holding his hand 24/7 while he was in a coma, to be with him while he went through the underground, the gateway and the core back and forth experiencing the bright light and the melodious songs and the angelic being, to be able to hear with the whole being without anyone talking, to be able to see without physical eyes, to not have a concept of time, to feel a divine presence and be overjoyed to the fullest.
